website_summaries.verdict: If you need a portable charger for your laptop that powers off the battery in your car, this is a budget-friendly choice.
pros: Small and lightweight, yet it offers nice features – has two USB ports and a handy AC outlet
Durable build thanks to the sturdy aluminum housing
cons: Some laptops take longer to achieve full charges than others
Interior cooling fan tends to make noises

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a breast feeding mom who has just gone back to work. I am often in and out of client'a home and driving around unfamiliar areas. I can now use my pump in the car. So thankful to have this. I only have a need for the prong plug.
customer_reviews.author: Pina The Wonder Dog

customer_reviews.title: Fun to Have!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my!!! What fun I have had with this little gizmo!! It arrived in perfect condition. I have used it in my 2007 Jeep JK Sahara. I was in a parade and used it to run 2 sets of Christmas lights around my Jeep at Halloween. I can't wait for Christmas to get here. It is super quiet. I didn't hear any noise, not even through the radio. It runs like a champ. Stays cool, never hot. If I could change anything about it, it would have a longer cord. But, I did use an extension cord to run lights to the back of my Jeep.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for either of my laptops, and it broke one of them.
customer_reviews.text: It would not power my Chromebook. It broke my work laptop. Somehow, after being plugged into the inverter, the laptop just shut down. All this occurred in the first twenty minutes of use. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Inverter for Car/Camping
customer_reviews.text: Works absoluelty great. I used mine everyday for about 2 months then got my girlfriend one on sale for less than 15 bucks. You do need to remember to not leave the inverter plugged into your car while you turn it on or the surge of electricity from your car starting can overload the inverter and cause it to fail. I just got into the habit of unplugging and plugging it back in and it has been working great.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan harris

customer_reviews.title: Blew out the fuzes on 3 of my car plugs ...
customer_reviews.text: Blew out the fuzes on 3 of my car plugs as well as my husbands. Sparks. Going in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Arianne Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I got this just to run an electric kettle so I could make coffee when camping. Not only would it not provide power to the kettle, it broke the cars "cigarette lighter." (I'm hoping it's just a fuse.) But this piece of junk is going to cost me far more than the purchase price in time and money to undo the damage it did.
customer_reviews.author: JK07

customer_reviews.title: I plugged into my 2016 Honda Civic And it always ...
customer_reviews.text: I plugged into my 2016 Honda Civic And it always kills my battery !! I’ve been left stranded in the middle of no where 😭 because of me trying to charge a phone lol
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: BURNED OUT DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Im so incredibly upset and disappointed. The charger ran VERY hot and the sharp aluminum body scratched up my MacBook but thats not what I'm most upset about. It not only burnt out within a month, it burned out my lighter socket in my car! It hurt out my friends car lighter socket too! wtf??
customer_reviews.author: Sarab

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect in my travel Trailer.
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my travel trailer to run my CPAP. It worked great. The cooling fan is quiet and I was able to run my CPAP for 6 days before needing to recharge my batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a power outlet for my car so that ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a power outlet for my car so that I could use my laptop conveniently in the car. This seems to be very sturdily built. It doesn't take up a huge amount of space, and it gives me ample electric access for all the devices I want to run. The fact that it is compact and seems to be built solidly really matter to me. Have been able now to use my computer and devices conveniently from the car.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Curry

customer_reviews.title: When I was prgnant and had terrible back pain the only thing that helped was having ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been a life saver. When I was prgnant and had terrible back pain the only thing that helped was having a heating pad on 24/7. I had to drive from St. Louis to Chicago a few times and this thing made it so I could have my heating pad, don't know if I could have made that drive with out this. Charged cell phones really fast too, runs with no noise does not get hot when running
customer_reviews.author: JulieAnn

customer_reviews.title: Too much current for my car.
customer_reviews.text: This seems poorly designed for its purpose. It runs off the cigarette lighter style outlets typical in cars. In my car, these two outlets are connected to 10A and 20A fuses. This product specifies 40A input. I of course didn't realize this until after the fact and blew the 10A fuse, which I then had to replace. May work well in vehicles that can handle it, but check your current ratings first! Disappointed in this purchase - waste of both my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice in car inverter/charger - Great quality and low price
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful inverter that allows you to plug in a device with a regular power cord into your car cigarette lighter plug. It also works to charge your mobile phone through the USB cord. It is a great value for the price. I have seen and used other similar products that either cost a lot more, or do not supply enough power. This one is an excellent choice. I love mine. I used it on the electric air pump for my camping air mattress, and also to charge the battery on my CPAP machine. It also charged my Apple smartphone. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for working on a laptop in the passenger seat
customer_reviews.text: I cannot yet speak for the longevity of this device; however, one extended use and I am in love. I often travel by car with my wife and have the good fortune to work remotely most of the time. With the reliability of 4G service on interstates, a willing chauffeur, and this wonderful little device, I was able to work for the entire drive on my laptop without a single glitch which allowed us to leave on our vacation a day early. The Foval kept my laptop and my wife's phone (which was providing the 4G access) fully charged all the way to our destination.
customer_reviews.author: RedMasque1

customer_reviews.title: Medela Breast Pump lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in the car with my Medela breast pump. Works great and I don't have to keep replacing batteries!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: This worked out great for me
customer_reviews.text: This worked out great for me. I used it for a portable air mattress inflater. The only thing I am unsure of how many amps the actual 110 plug can handle. The description (at the time of purchase) said 3.1 amps total output, but it also listed that right after speaking about the USB outlets. I haven't used anything to test those limits and probably never will so it is going well.
customer_reviews.author: T. S.

customer_reviews.title: So tiny!
customer_reviews.text: I was hunting for my old AC converter to give to my daughter for her car so she could use her heating pad for her shoulders. I couldn't find it so I just bought this one for her to put under the tree for Christmas. I'm thrilled at how small it is. It fits in the palm of my hand. My old AC converter is about the size of an old cigar box/school box. She'll be able to stash this easily in her glove box or armrest console. The extra USB ports are an added plus. Now if only came in purple (her favorite color), it would be perfect, lol.
customer_reviews.author: VA Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good start, bad finish
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to power a string of 1W LED lights on a covered bridge. It runs off a deep cycle battery and solar charger. A photocell timer runs the lights from dark 4 hours. Setup worked fine for several nights then wouldn’t come on the following night. The red “trouble” light was on. I unplugged the inverter and rep lugged it. Worked fine thru the night. Next night, same problem. Load is only around 24 watts. The time it runs before shutting down has shortened to almost nothing. Unit is worthless now.
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 2 seconds
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about two seconds before it (I'm assuming) shorted out and now won't turn on. Save your money and don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very bad
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used one of these before so was very careful to read all the instructions before use. The cellphone I was charging is way less than 150W. When I plugged in the cellphone to charge it would come on and off, like would charge for a few seconds and stop charging for another few seconds. After about 5 mins of this I noticed sparks coming from inside the inverter! Luckily it didn't start a fire as I plugged it out on time but I got the shock of my life! I need this to charge my cellphone when on the road but really scared to buy another one
customer_reviews.author: luke Leo

customer_reviews.title: OVERALL GODLY INFERTER
customer_reviews.text: Was amazing! Used it on our 9-day trip around Iceland for the three kiddies in the back seat for their phones, drone charger, camera battery charger, wifi on the go, etc etc etc. Charged incredibly quickly. Used it so much/well that we didn't even have to charge at night which was good bc we only had two US>EU chargers to split between 5 people. Also awesome since it has the plug that fits our American chargers as well as two usb ports, but you already know that from the product picture. Feels substantial and fits in the seat pocket.
customer_reviews.author: omama

customer_reviews.title: Good first impression
customer_reviews.text: I haven't yet needed this for a long-term trip or extended charging or anything like that, so I can't attest to how quickly it charges, or how hot it gets. That said, I gave it a quick function test, and it's quieter than the car, it powers what you plug into it, and it definitely charges electronics! It's compact, and stores easily in the already crowded center console of my SUV. Remember that this thing just runs off of your car battery, so don't try to power a refrigerator with it and then complain when the inverter (or worse, something behind the inverter) burns out!
customer_reviews.author: SA7

customer_reviews.title: This is everything the makers said it would be and more!
customer_reviews.text: They said to rate the noise level. I say "What noise". It is extremely quiet. It charges my laptop and iPhone quickly. I have not notices it heating at all. I am simply satisfied in every way. I wanted a charger for my MacBook Pro and this one not only charges the Mac it also charges my iPad and iPhone. I was using several chargers and and still couldn't charge my MacBook Pro...with this one, I can charge all of it. You want a great charger...look no further! You have found it. There is nothing not to like about this. I am glad I found it!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Gentleman

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for plugging into my Subaru for blowing up an ...
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for plugging into my Subaru for blowing up an air mattress and charging some power tools while on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine N. Deal

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic plug
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great for one road trip. Cheap plastic piece for a plug broke shortly after. Will be buying a nicer product next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It blew my fuse in my care the first and only time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Woody

customer_reviews.title: Not A Lasting Device
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my car so I could charge via a household outlet. Within a few weeks of intermittent use (like once every 1-2 weeks), I noticed that just leaving it plugged into the a/c port on my car would cause it to heat up like crazy. I mean like hot to the point that it would be very uncomfortable or even painful to touch. Now, I can't even leave it plugged in, because aside from the heat it started humming loudly too. Overall, would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: s2hmhqP9quR

customer_reviews.title: I use this in my work truck
customer_reviews.text: I work in construction and I will often need to use my truck as a mobile office. This little power inverter handles my computer and cell phone at the same time with no problem. It is quiet and it charges quickly. I usually for get it and let it roll around on the floor until I need it again, so it is definitely durable as well. I have been using this power inverter for about a year now and I would say it is definitely a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Nice gadget
customer_reviews.text: I really like this piece of gadget, very useful when going on trips and want to charge laptops and iPads quickly and not using the slow car chargers. One thing that prevents this thing from being a five star, it's internal fan is noisy and you can hear it in the car, I found that annoying.
customer_reviews.author: David Mavashev

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller cars
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for Car chargers for my DJI Mavic drone batteries and they are insanely expensive which is when it occurred I could use the same wall socket charger with the Car AC inverter, found this on daily deal and couldn't be any happier for my the long road trips, this came very useful. Perfect match for my need, came with 2 USB ports to charge the cellphones and charge the Drone batteries, it small enough that can be hidden inbetween seats and no noise. The only lazy thing I found is to pull the Cable when I get out of car
customer_reviews.author: Jegan

customer_reviews.title: Good item, good price
customer_reviews.text: I choose this item because of its price point and the other positive reviews. I needed an inverter for the car to run my heating pad for long trips and was pleased that it performed perfectly, even charging a few other items at the same time. It’s small size makes it easy to keep in the car and the metal housing ensure that it’ll remain undamaged while stored. The only disappointing thing was that the day after I purchased mine, it went on sale as a lightening deal for less. But that has nothing to do with it’s performance, just my bad timing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Product Reliability is a Major Issue! - Need a full refund and DO NOT recommend to BUY.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in July ...used it only a couple of times with a long trip (400 miles drive) in late August and late November. I don't use it for short trips when I am home only driving to the stores here and there. My last trip in November, this product failed to charge my phone and I was out of luck to be able to use my phone's Waze for driving direction!!! This not only upsets me but also put me in a very "iffy" situation to try to find my way. I would like to return this product for a full refund!!! If there is a negative "star", I would rate it negative 5 - please advise.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Misguided, Bad advertisement
customer_reviews.text: i’m super upset with this product. It says it’s 150W but it’s only 110W. Making it unusable for what I wanted it for, it doesn’t have enough power to run the 120W Intex air pump i bought for the exact reason to use them together in my car at the beach. If i could refund I would. Product is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nowlen

customer_reviews.title: Blown fuses
customer_reviews.text: First ever product review because this product was so horrible. I plugged it in and nothing happened. We stopped by the Best Buy, where they tested it and the guy immediately said “do not plug this into anything. It’ll just blow out more fuses.” After buying a reputable car charger there, we had to drive across town and get new fuses for the car, since they were blown for the cigarette lighter ports. I should’ve listened to the other 1 star reviews. At least you can learn from my mistake... hopefully...
customer_reviews.author: Twinter

customer_reviews.title: works great even after using it for about 4 months
customer_reviews.text: works great even after using it for about 4 months! I am a college student and it is very useful to charge my laptop in my car when I am busy at school. It may heat up but that is expected. I find it very interesting that it is powered by a fan, the fan lets you know when it is reaching its "maximum" I guess you can say. It has never stopped on me and always pushes it's little engine to the fullest. I love it recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Medd

customer_reviews.title: Blew up our air mattress in the middle of nowhere
customer_reviews.text: Used it to blow up our air mattress while camping. We wish we would have also brought an extension cord so we didn't have to pull up so close but that's just our novice camping experience
customer_reviews.author: BSKLeach

customer_reviews.title: Great use in my car.
customer_reviews.text: This is used in my car as I travel for my job. I use it to heat up my food and it works great. I like that it is small. The item was packaged nicely and arrived in good time. I have only used it once so far. This was just received within the last month (Dec. 2018) so I will update as time goes. That it has a usb port for charging my phone is an added bonus. That frees up my other port in the car for my GPS to plug into.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is not a high powered inverter, but it does exactly what I need it to. I use it in my work vehicle to power my Hot Logic and have hot meals for lunch, and it performs as needed. Have not had any issues. It is nice that it also has USB ports. Since it powers my Hot Logic just fine, I imagine that it will work for just about anything else. I have also used it for a cordless drill charger and it did just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works exceptionally welk
customer_reviews.text: I really like this portable laptop charger. It works exceptionally well and charged both laptops rather quickly. I would advise that you turn in your car while charging. If your car is in the off position for a few hours it could drain your car battery from the power it pulls. Beyond that this product is s win
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Killed my car battery completely in a few hours
customer_reviews.text: This power inverter completely killed the battery in my car just in a few hours while I was driving for my vacation. And it was even nothing plugged in it! So, I had to call road side assistance to jump start the car, to drive directly to nearby auto store and to buy a new battery. It was too expensive experience. Stay away from this device
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet and stays cool
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed, I have it in my work truck, have my phone and tablet on the USB ports to charge and a battery charger for my drill on the 110v outlet. Super quiet and stays cool. And its smaller than I thought it would be, fits in your hand. Overall extremely pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little inverter at a great price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectations in every way. I bench tested this little inverter and it worked as expected. The input range is 12V to 15V and the output is well regulated 110V AC. The small fan cools the inverter adequately at 100 Watts continuous output. I then took the unit apart for evaluation and was impressed by the workmanship. The switching transistors are correctly heat-sunk to the case and the PCB is well made and well soldered. The only slight negative is the AC receptacle, which appears a bit flimsy. Nonetheless, it worked with a wide variety of AC plugs that I had around the shop, with repeated insertions.
customer_reviews.author: David Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Like it bc it doesn’t over heat!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I finally found a great car outlet! I need it for my breast pump. I returned to work and still pumping. This came in handy!! I have used it several times and is so easy to use and it doesn’t over heat while I pump. I’ve pump as far as 35 mins with not interruptions. Is powerful as well. My husband connects other things like his iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Fabianna

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money ☹
customer_reviews.text: This did not work! I bought it for our trip to Texas so I could use my breast pump and our phone chargers and it just had a red light but would not work! Do not waste your money ☹
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Cottrill

customer_reviews.title: Great product but lacking an auto off
customer_reviews.text: A great product. Very solid, good power and good metal. The only reason I give it 3 stars is because I made a rookie mistake; leaving it plugged in. I mistakenly thought this would have an auto off switch, which it should; but it doesn't. No big problem, just jumped the car and it was fine. Just a word of warning; don't be a fool and unplug it when you're at destination.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can not handle basic uses.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this so I could use my laptop while on the road while homeless, we did the research and the specs it has should by far be able to handle it. Instead it over heats and makes a buzzing noise that vibrates that made me think I was having car trouble, far louder than a normal fan noise. I reached out to the seller who said the would replace it for me but they never replied to my response. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Wimmer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making your car into a mobile working station!
customer_reviews.text: My car did not come with an outlet to charge my computer and this converter works perfectly! The extra USB cables are awesome too! It is compact and fits right in my center console.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: Short cable, but good build.
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep this short and sweet. This is better than buying your generic Wal-Mart inverter. It has a aluminum housing, so it won't break after a few drops. It's cheaper than what you'd normally find (if you can still find) at Wal-Mart, and it's corded, so it doesn't hang out the dash or impede with your center console lid. The only problem is the very short cable. If you have an accessory outlet that is in your car dash, this might hang from the outlet. Cord length is only 2ft. You really have to keep this thing close. Other than that, great for the price. 4/5
customer_reviews.author: Theliberati0n

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I used it only once to power my laptop. The second time, the LED light stayed red and won't power anything I plug into it. Now it can't even power on my little personal USB fan. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Meli

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT for unexpected Work from Car situation
customer_reviews.text: This does EXACTLY what I need it to do. The only thing is that it does occasionally make my laptop charger make a noise - so I try to not leave that plugged in too long. I also wish the outside of the device was a little smoother and maybe had rounded edges; as well as that it had a longer cord. I keep finding it digging up against my leg (fail).
customer_reviews.author: Cilla

customer_reviews.title: Blew the fuse - JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Blew the fuse rated at 12V, 15A (180W) on both the 12V sockets in the front of a 2017 Acura MDX. Acura dealer replaced the fuse for FREE and measured the current consumption on this device and the instantaneous startup current is ~18A on this unit although the unit says 150W which corresponds to ~12.5A. The 18A startup surge current without any load connected to this device caused the 15A fuse to blow. Piece of untested junk. Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer San Jose CA

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power! Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I power a box fan in my truck with this thing and wow am I supposed this baby hold up. It's def over the wattage but my fuses/computer are having no issue with it. Very very strong. I wouldn't recommend over powering it because you can have serious electrical issues but I personally don't care. Would reccoment this bad boy
customer_reviews.author: Justin Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Died slowly over 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seven months ago. I use it in my travel trailer to power my TV while on battery. It worked fine at first, but gradually, the light turned from green to red and shut-off more and more. Now, it won't power the TV for more than 30 seconds before it switches to this condition. I can't even use it to power a laptop PC with a 60W power supply. Now 7 months old, this thing is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: JLDizzy

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Bestek micro sized inverter.
customer_reviews.text: I needed an inverter to power my Apple Homepod while camping. I bought the BESTEK 150W Power Inverter DC 12V to 110V AC Converter 4.2A Dual USB Car Adapter, Thinner Design with ETL Listed. During testing, it goes into auto protect when playing heavy bass. I slapped on a Kill-A-Watt to see how many watts the HomePod is pulling and it's less than 65W yet the Bestek goes into protect mode. Tried this Foval and it's working fine. The fan is quieter than the Bestek.
customer_reviews.author: PomanFerrari

customer_reviews.title: So worth it! Powers my breast pump, clip on fan, and two phone chargers!
customer_reviews.text: This adapter has been a life saver. I’ve been using it for about 4 months and it is going strong. I have it attached to my son’s clip on fan over his car seat. I have also used it on: his fan, two phone chargers and my Medela breast pump. This thing runs like a champ! I am VERY happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cpcheer630

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit and finish on this
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and finish on this. I didn’t need or want a high-powered unit, as I mainly wanted to use my Dremel in a mobile environment. I ran dedicated wires to my battery, used an on/off switch to control when it was needed, and mounted it with a Velcro strap to a small shelf I made in the rear of my suv. Having usb ports made it very convenient to charge my phone while I am working out of the suv.
customer_reviews.author: B. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I've used a power inverter in the past and needed a new one. This snazzy little device works perfectly. We're on an 8-hour road trip as I type this and the inverter is doing great. We are charging one phone and one computer currently. We lost good radio reception about 100 miles back while we're in BFE--but since I can connect to my computer we've still got a great playlist. Love this little thing!! 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: BnB

customer_reviews.title: I like this car power converter plug but the only problem ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this car power converter plug but the only problem is the USB slots were too close to the main plug that it was useless. It is of great use when I'm on the road and needed to pump or charge my laptop. Otherwise, it's not worth the amount since I cannot use the USB slots to charge my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwo

customer_reviews.title: This will NOT charge most laptops - cannot provide enough wattage & amperage
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard sized Lenovo laptop (T480) that I purchased this inverter for. I get an error message when I plug my laptop into it saying it does not have enough wattage to charge my laptop. I purchased it based on the description saying it would provide 150 Watts of continuous power. It must not provide that. It is useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark in NC

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use my laptop in the car when out visiting clients or traveling. The first one I received I had trouble with so I emailed the seller. They sent me a new unit in a couple of days! Fantastic customer service. And the replacement works perfect. It is very quiet as well. Come to find out, the first unit may not have been bad after all , I believe it was a bad laptop cord. Do not hesitate to order this unit from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Boooya

customer_reviews.title: Keep in mind the max Amp output!
customer_reviews.text: It works for basic electronics. It powered a 32 inch Samsung LCD to show a customer that the TV works. But don't expect to power machines off of this. I tried to test a lawn dethatcher that draws 13A with it and the machine spun a couple of inches and that's it. I think that blew my fuse on the car too. I don't blame the device though, it is my fault for not being cautious about the amp draw.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Will burn out your outlet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product except that it burnt out my cigarette lighter outlet. All I used was a vacuum. So unless you have a ton of power in yours, don't bother, it will just keep killing the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for surfer girls.
customer_reviews.text: This unit works well, but be aware that appliances that take a lot of energy, such as hairdryers, will not work. My flat iron works fine with this unit, so I use the flat iron along with the heater of my FJ Cruiser to dry and straighten my hair in the car after surfing.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.P.

customer_reviews.title: Very good, some quirks
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice compact unit. We found inconsistent results when using fast-charge 110V adapters for phones. Some combinations of cables and adapter will get you fast charging and some wont. But if you charge those same adapters/cables into 110V household current, you always get fast-charge. So something weird is up. But for most cases this is a good utility for road trips or vacations, laptops, etc.
customer_reviews.author: inayat2012 on youtube

customer_reviews.title: This size was perfect for my car
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the size up from this and it kept blowing a fuse in my car. I sized down to this one (1 standard outlet plug, 2 USB plug ports) and it stopped blowing the fuse. I was thankful for that. I use this to plug in my breast pump so I can pump on my ride to and from work. It is a little bulky and takes up a bit of room (approx. 4inx3in) in my small car that has no storage, but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Silent, works great
customer_reviews.text: The big thing is silent. Absolutely works great. The form factor is perfect for my needs. I place it in the cuddy hole in my car where it is barely noticable and run anything I want through my vehicles​ entertainment system. I will probably order one once I get home from my vacation (I've been using everyday) just to have another one because this is the best inverter for the price I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: mrmark

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient to have, works for all my needs (laptops, mobile devices, fans, air pumps). I got ambitious and tried to see if it could power my large, touchscreen operated, Keurig coffee maker but unsurprisingly I was not able to get that to work. Aside from not powering heavy duty appliances (which you shouldn’t really expect in an old Nissan Altima anyway) this is a great product and I don’t think you’ll be disappointed. Works simply by plugging it in and I haven’t noticed any noice or excessive heat coming from it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with converter
customer_reviews.text: I was not aware these how reasonably these are priced & purchased one just so I could use my 110 Volt Drop-light with around 20 line at night powered with a spare 12 volt battery when outside & not near a receptacle, that alone is worth it and considering ordering another with double the capacity... It's easy to convert AC to DC as I've done hundreds of times throughout my life, but was never able to do the opposite, when I checked to see how this was done I couldn't believe all that was required to convert to AC...
customer_reviews.author: vernon

customer_reviews.title: This ain’t it sis, won’t stay on while using
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to use this for more than 2 minutes at a time. I got this to plug in my small travel heating pad in my car. This wouldn’t even get my heating pad hot, it was go on and off. I tried several plug in items and same thing every time :/.....
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stewart Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Kills car battery if left plugged in
customer_reviews.text: I'd give 5 stars for tiny tasks such as charging small electronics and it works great for my breast pump but it doesnt have any warnings about being left plugged in. My truck battert died after I left it plugged in overnight. Never had that problem with anything else left plugged in. So 4 stars because the company should put disclaimers on their product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well.
customer_reviews.text: Have only have it a few weeks but was perf from when used every night camping. I connected to deep cycle battery and this was used to charge cell phones as well as to keep airmattress (low amp never deflate pump) connected to keep mattress from loosing air. Also, there is nothing delicate about me, and this appears rugged and handled my throwing it around with the camping gear. This inverter worked as advertised, careful when ordering an inverter and know what wattage and peak wattage is appropriate for your use.
customer_reviews.author: Jon-Marc LEplattenier

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to be able to operate something that usually uses the cigarette lighter, but that cord quit working. It also could use a power adapter,however, my pickup did not have that option. My pickup did have a 12 V plug so I was happy to find this adapter. Now I can use my device in my pickup as well as my other autos. It works without problems and doesn't heat up.
customer_reviews.author: nwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Great little inverter
customer_reviews.text: This inverter worked just as expected. The amperage rating isn't very high so I suspect most of the negative reviews are from folks who tried to power something that demanded more current than the inverter could provide. We used it to power Halloween lights at an event at our church and it worked all evening long.
customer_reviews.author: John & Anita M

customer_reviews.title: Works Well For Small Electronics
customer_reviews.text: I feel like my car's USB plugs don't provide any power for phone charging, so I got this item to use for that. It works well for charging phones and tablets from either the USB connections or the AC power plug. Can also power my chromebook with no issues. Other than that, I haven't tried to push the limits of its power, but I am pleased with how it works and would recommend it for similar purposes.
customer_reviews.author: R. Toro

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough wonderful things about this device. We're taking a year-long road trip, and originally planned to use solar panels to power our devices. Well we have yet to get the panels out, for various reasons, but have used this inverter over and over to power our cell phones and laptops while we're driving. It is far, far cheaper than the Goal Zero battery we bought first, and as far as I'm concerned this is going to be the only power device we'll need on the trip. A great, affordable, well-designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: I never do reviews however after using this inverter daily since November of 2016 (it is June of 2020 now) I thought I’d leave one. I’ve ran numerous items on it from tablets, laptops, phones, desk fans, etc and never have had an issue besides in the last couple months when it has a noise coming from the fan (but after 4 years I would have expected it to break along time ago.) this has helped me out when my AC went out on my patrol vehicle and had to use a desk fan to keep cool in the middle of Florida in the summer. Great product, 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cal J.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Fail in Emergency Situation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this some time ago, confident it was a good choice to have in my emergency kit. I needed it to plug in a nebulizer this am and it didn’t work at all. I tried two places in my van and neither worked. What a waste of money and a nightmare of a situation. So much for being well prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Irishmommy2

customer_reviews.title: Got me through a power outage
customer_reviews.text: This little power box is so effective. It along with the grace of God got me through a power outage. 1 plug grounded plug outlet and multiple USB outlets. Kept 1 fan running and 3 phones (including my S20) over night from my suv for 6 hours every night. This is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A handy gadget on a trip.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it when I travel long distance. I don't have a car charger for my phone so I can use my charger that came with the phone and plug it in to this. It charges quickly. I also plug in my iPod to this using the USB part and play my tunes while I travel. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: L. R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Super useful
customer_reviews.text: I ended up not needing this for when I went camping, but I used it for a bit to test it out, and holy check is it super cool. I was considering keeping it because of how useful/sleek and cool it is. But I returned it. If I'm going to need one again, I'm going to go with one that has 2 outlets. Also, pack an extension cord with it just in case.
customer_reviews.author: EYE-6

customer_reviews.title: Christmas lights on a car.
customer_reviews.text: My Corvette club was asked to participate in a night-time Christmas parade. We needed to put Christmas lights on our cars. Never did that before. So we used these inverters. Just plug one into your cigarette lighter and add normal Christmas lights. We were a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Sushi Broker

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS BEST POWER INVERTER I'VE EVER PURCHASED.
customer_reviews.text: 5 STAR PRODUCT. I have been trying to find a true high voltage USB charger and have spent a lot of money doing so before buying this product. I have 5 different cars and have tried this in every one of them. All have charged my phone faster then any other car charger I've tried even with two phones and a laptop plugged in charging. I believe I've had it for a month or so and have been recommending it to everyone looking for a fast USB car chsrger. So far it's been tested with a ZTE ZMAX 2, SAMSUNG GALAXY S5 & S6, IPHONE 5 & 7 and a HP laptop that all charged quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: Good little unit
customer_reviews.text: Using to charge surface pro, phone, and ext battery nearly 10hrs/day. No complaints so far. The 110v socket is a little loose and pulls out a bit when you remove the plug, but I haven't had a problem with it yet. Everything is working appropriately as far as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: DeepSeaJesus

customer_reviews.title: I've had this thing for 4 years now and its still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my work van, mainly to charge laptops and phone. Its been under heavy use and has been kicked around . It is still being used in one of my work vans and it charges phones SUPER FAST. I'm actually on the product page because I now have two work vans, and I am letting my guys have the first one I bought. I am ordering a couple more of these products to have in my van. These definitely exceeded my expectations! P.S. I had to look through all my past orders to find this one again; I don't trust other similar products!
customer_reviews.author: raul

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could charge my computer while riding in the car. It was great! I used it while my daughter drove on a long distance trip. It was great to be able to read and get work done without worrying about battery life. Because you can also use a USB, we could still charge our phones as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I was hesitant. This device has been a life saver! We live on a bus and needed a way to charge our laptops and use our printer to work remotely. This is doing the job! If I have any trouble, I'll update this post.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina G. Rafatti

customer_reviews.title: Makes life a bit simpler
customer_reviews.text: We install and service water filtration systems and pou water coolers. We have gravitated to cordless products as they became better designed to handle heavier work and broader applications. We use them for air pumps, work lights, hand tools/drills. We even use them to drill through sinks with 1/2” bits. A lot of battery need so we use this product to generate ac from our trucks dc to keep the batteries coming.
customer_reviews.author: Yourwaterguy

customer_reviews.title: Powers my laptop
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues with my laptop using the 110V in my car. It was not charging correctly so I purchased this to put in the front lighter plug and it works great. We used it on a long road trip to have extra plugs and it worked like charm. I didn't hear any noises coming from it like some inverters seem to make when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for phones and laptops etc.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better chargers. It allows you to use a laptop that needs to be plugged into an outlet, and also you can charge your phone and another device. Very well made and compact. It has a built-in fan to it from overheating. You can buy cheaper ones for a few dollars less, but why would you?
customer_reviews.author: Ron Stewart

customer_reviews.title: very functional unit!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a trip recently for the USB ports on it and to power a USB charging hub. It worked great and was quieter than the car so that was nice. *update* I have now bought two of these. The first one was stolen out of my vehicle (one of the few items taken). So apparently it is good enough to steal out of a vehicle. I used to have it plugged in all the time and sitting on the console. So if you have this in your vehicle keep it out of site. I'm going to re route the power and store it in the console.
customer_reviews.author: 1101 base2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the wifes laptop
customer_reviews.text: With her always complaining about running out of power on her laptop while we are on the road, we found that this was a perfect solution for her. I never hear "Why the heck am I running out of power?" anymore. Happy wife happy life haha.
customer_reviews.author: TheReye5Family

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!! worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th one I’ve ordered in the past couple years! Traveling is a regular part of my lifestyle so this product is a must have. I can’t tell you how many times it’s come in handy over the past few years. It honestly holds up better than any other brand I’ve tried. I ended up buying one from Target that was $39 and had to return it to buy another one of these. Excellent packaging and quality my old one held up for 4 years before I had to pass it on to a family friend. Amazing! I love it so much I insisted that all my family members get their own!
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I charge 2 phones and my laptop. I have no problems at all. My work truck inverter stopped working so Iuse this now. The inverter has been fixed now but I no longer use it. I rather use this inverter because it seems to work better at charging my stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sewing on a sailboat.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this guy to power my Brother sewing machine to make canvas repairs onboard my sailboat. Worked great. I was concerned that it would draw a lot of current just from being on and not in use but this was not an issue. Sewing machine use is of course intermittent, but it sure did the trick. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: B Toan

customer_reviews.title: Road Tested
customer_reviews.text: I drive a lot, and I use this all the time. I took a road trip with friends when I first got it, and it worked well. It's physical size was much smaller than I expected, but it charged all our electronics. We used it for laptops, camera batteries, phones, and Go Pros, and we had no issues. I use this in my car for work every day for my phone and laptop.
customer_reviews.author: KALVO

customer_reviews.title: You can’t use it for crap, except usb....
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much nothing is 110v and under. I just wanted to use a simple heating pad....wouldn’t work. Laptops certainly don’t work. My asthma nebulizer won’t work either. Nothing I plugged in worked. It’s a piece of trash. I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyMiche

customer_reviews.title: Power at your fingertips!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I am a non-techy Mom/Nana. I like to be able to charge my cell phone tablet while driving, but always wished for some "electricity" in my van, too. This fills the bill! I keep a spare camera battery charger in my car, and now I have the ability to charge-on-the-go. Nice knowing it is there if I want to use it for charging my laptop, should I need it to entertain a grandchild on the road(or myself, if I am not driving!). There always seems to be somebody needing to charge something. Wish I had bought one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Jane M. Cash

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to keep my Dell laptop charged up for long trips so I could work on the road. I've used it in the car at least 30 hours, and it's been dropped, stepped on/etc. by my kids. It's still going great and not shown any sign of breaking. I also was charging one of the more beefier laptops that needed the 19.5v chargers, and it worked great (so long as the car was on)
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Outputs only 90 volts!
customer_reviews.text: As my laptop refuses to charge when plugged into this, I tested it with my voltmeter, and found it is only outputting 90 volts. Too bad I missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Did not handle 35 watt!!
customer_reviews.text: It didnt last 4 days.. with a 35 watt load... soldering pencil is the device it is the device it was powering when the inverter failed.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Keith

product_meta.title: Foval 150W Car Power Inverter 12V DC to 110V AC Converter with 3.1A Dual USB Car Charger
product_meta.description:
HOW to FIND a GOOD CAR POWER INVERTER for OUR TRAVEL CHARGER COMPANION? 


Silent Fan: 
Smart cooling fan makes the car power inverter silent when operating, and it runs faster when it gets warmer. 

Stable: 
Full-protection with short-circuit , low-voltage , over-charge,over-voltage, over-load,over-temperature protection,built-in fuse. 

LED Indicator: 
Green-operation, red-fail. 

Utility Cord & Cigarette Lighter: 
Placed random, about 16 inches length cable with cigarette lighter plug since we can reach it to power a laptop in the rear seats. 

Car Travel Charger Companion 
The ultimate car travel charger for road trips, vacations, outdoors, emergency kits and more; Few products come close for sheer on-the-go versatility. 
Easy to use, simply plug the 300W inverter straight into the vehicle's cigarette lighter. 
Enjoy 2 USB ports (3.1A) and 2 standard plug outlets (e.g. for laptops) for convenient charging on the road. 

Ultimate Versatility 
It can be used for camping, outdoors, vacations, road trips, remote job sites, and even charging household items.
Dual USB ports effortlessly charge two devices (including any smart phones and tablets) at once while the outlets can power a wide range of power-hungry items on the road. 
For maximum utility, stay in charge at all times and add this to your travel emergency kit. 

Car Power Inverter Specifications: 
Color:Red
Total Power: 150W
Input: DC 12V/40A 
AC Output: 110V 
USB Output1-2: DC 5V/3.1A 
Size: 3.2 x 2.5 x 1.5 inches 
Weight: 8 oz (295g)

Get the Foval Edge: 
18 Month worry-free warranty 
24 hour dedicated email customer support 
100% customer satisfaction 
Premium quality, cutting edge technology at affordable prices
feature_bullets: Premium 150w car power inverter with 2 USB ports and AC outlets. Dual USB ports can charge most phones and tablets simultaneously (Max 3.1A total output), while AC outlets great for Christmas gift, charging string lights, laptop, breast pump, CPAP machine, nebulizer, game console, kindle, TV, DVD players, lights, iPad, and other electronic devices
Travel kit: just about credit card size - 3.2 x 2.5 x 1.5 inches, space-saving and easy storage, with aluminum shell design, extremely portable and lightweight at only 8 oz+
Mufti-Protection: built-in fuse to protect your device, stable charging design provides protection against, overheating, under and over voltage charging, short circuiting, overloads, and overcharging
Durable metal housing provides advanced protection from drops and bumps. Integrated very silent cooling fan helps reduce heat and prevents short-circuit
What you get: Foval 150W car power inverter, user manual, 18 months warranty and 100% customer service /*****/ Please make sure that you buy from Foval, if not, please return the item you get /****/
